Issue.creator: bstasyszyn
Issue.summary: Prioritize endorsers based on private data collections
Issue.description: Currently when private data collections are specified in the invocation chain (in channel.Execute) then all endorsers that do not have read access to that collection are excluded and the endorsement will fail if a sufficient set of endorsers is not found that will satisfy the chaincode policy. An option should be added to channel.Execute that specifies whether to Exclude endorser that don't have read access to the collection, or to Prioritize the endorsers by those that _do_ have access to the collection.
